title: Drawing, "Chandelier", 1810–25
medium:
Pen and black ink, watercolor, graphite
Support: thick white wove paper; old fold(?) at center
inscribed: inscribed in pen and brown ink, at right: Prix avec six. Branches cornet 330 F.; at lower right: Prix dor avec Banznet Prix 235 F.; at lower margin: No. 1 Lampe Six Lumi res dessin e moiti grandeur.
creditline: Museum purchase through gift of various donors

tombstone.epitaph:
Drawing, "Chandelier", 1810–25.
1810–25. Pen and black ink, watercolor, graphite
Support: thick white wove paper; old fold(?) at center. Museum purchase through gift of various donors. 1901-39-3172.
